products.name: Coconut Water
products.labels: Sans gluten,Kascher,Sans OGM,100% naturel,en:FSC,FSC Mix,en:Non GMO project,en:Star-K Kosher
products.facts: ["Coconut water is the clear liquid found inside young green coconuts, primarily composed of water and electrolytes.","Coconut palms are environmentally friendly as they require minimal water and can grow in various soil types, contributing to biodiversity.","Coconut water is low in calories and contains essential nutrients like potassium, sodium, and magnesium, making it a popular natural electrolyte drink.","The quality of coconut water can vary based on the age of the coconut and the processing methods used, with fresh coconut water typically being more nutritious than packaged alternatives."]
